channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.title: Report E-2024120398
item.description:
Report E-2024120398

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-20
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal USU experienced a UN2922 Ancamine 2678 release from 55-gallon metal drum. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 15-gallons of product released to a 10’ x 10’ area of the concrete dock floor due to a forklift puncture. The damaged drum was placed into an 85-gallon poly overpack. Absorbents were deployed and worked into the impacted area. All impacted absorbents and PPE were placed into a 55-gallon poly drum. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.
